description_en: Annual number and rate of deaths by administrative district and sex.
description_ms: Jumlah dan kadar kematian tahunan mengikut daerah pentadbiran dan jantina.
methodology_en: The data on deaths in Malaysia is tabulated based on information reported during the deaths registration process, specifically in the in Register of Death Form (JPN.LM02). The 'district' reported in this dataset is based on the place of usual residence of the deceased, not the geographical location in which the deceased passed away. For example, a person who passes away at a hospital in Petaling but resided in Sepang will be recorded as a death for Sepang. For a deeper understanding of the methodology and associated definition, please refer to the [Technical Notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/vitalstats-technotes).
methodology_ms: Data mengenai kematian di Malaysia dihasilkan berdasarkan maklumat yang dilaporkan semasa proses pendaftaran kelahiran, khususnya dalam Borang Daftar Kematian (JPN.LM02). Medan 'daerah' yang dilaporan dalam set data ini adalah berdasarkan tempat kediaman biasa simati dan bukannya lokasi geografi di mana simati telah meninggal dunia. Sebagai contoh, jika seseorang itu telah meninggal dunia di sebuah hospital di Petaling tetapi telah menetap di Sepang, maka kematian tersebut akan direkodkan sebagai kematian bagi Selangor. Untuk memahami metodologi dengan lebih terperinci, sila rujuk kepada [Nota Teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/technical-notes/vitalstats-technotes).
caveat_en:
This data is derived based on deaths registered with JPN. Therefore, if a death is not registered with JPN (for instance, if the death of a foreigner is registered in their home country, or the death of resident in a remote area is not registered), it will generally not count in this dataset. However, adjustment has been made to the number of deaths in Sabah to account for the under-reporting of deaths detected based on the 'Study of Under Reporting of Deaths in Sabah', which was conducted by DOSM and approved by the Steering Committee on Implementation of Civil Registration and Vital Statistics in 2016.

Furthermore, it should be noted that the number of administrative districts increased from 147 to 160 in 2021, due to the creation of new districts in Kelantan (1), Perak (1), Sabah (2), and Sarawak (9).
caveat_ms:
Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan kematian yang didaftarkan dengan JPN. Oleh itu, sekiranya kematian itu tidak didaftarkan dengan JPN (contohnya sekiranya kematian rakyat asing hanya didaftarkan di negara asal, ataupun kematian penduduk di kawasan yang sangat terpencil tidak didaftarkan) maka ia secara am tidak terkandung dalam set data ini. Namun, penyesuaian data kematian di Sabah telah dilaksanakan kerana kurang liputan pendaftaran yang didapati berdasarkan 'Kajian Kurang Liputan Pendaftaran Kematian di Sabah' yang telah dijalankan oleh DOSM dan diluluskan oleh Jawatankuasa Induk Pelaksanaan _Civil Registration and Vital Statistics_ pada tahun 2016.

Tambahan lagi, harus diambil perhatian bahawa bilangan daerah pentadbiran telah bertambah dari 147 ke 160 pada tahun 2021, kerana pengwujudan daerah pentadbiran baru di Kelantan (1), Perak (1), Sabah (2), dan Sarawak (9).
publication_en: OpenDOSM features a dashboard on [Population & Vital Statistics](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/population) where you can explore this data in a more interactive manner!
publication_ms: OpenDOSM memaparkan papan pemuka tentang [Penduduk & Perangkaan Penting](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/population) yang membolehkan anda menerokai data ini dengan lebih interaktif!

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 since the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD ditetapkan sebagai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: sex
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Either both sexes ('both'), male ('male') or female ('female')
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Sama ada kedua-dua jantina ('both'), lelaki ('male') atau perempuan ('female')

fields.name: abs
fields.description_en: [Integer] Number of deaths in that year
